alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:21PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Navajo and Coconino Counties along I-40 near Winslow through 400 PM MDT/300 PM MST/... At 319 PM MDT/219 PM MST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Meteor Crater to 10 miles west of Joseph City. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will reduce visibility, creating dangerous hazard conditions. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winslow, Sunrise, Leupp, Rimmy Jims, Meteor Crater and Homolovi State Park Campground. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 252 and 257. Interstate 40 between mile markers 234 and 272. State Route 87 between mile markers 336 and 363. State Route 99 between mile markers 35 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
